Subject: To Fall In.
From: "Carnage Blood" <Carnage@...>

**At the sound of their female Commanders voice Dinobot stopped instantly in his tracks, however in annoyance. He had finally reached his destination where he would collect the liquids he required to rebuild his mech fluid level, and the solids to revitalize his strength. However, he was to be denied the opportunity to feed and perhaps relax. Instead the pull to obey the Commander and continue to honor his loyalty was much stronger then the need to fill his stomach.  And so, with a rather annoyed and frustrated growl, he retraced his steps and started towards the limits of the city where the remainder of the Maximals were gathering. As so instructed.  Yet, as he made his way back his mind couldn't help wonder exactly where Tavatron had gotten off to? Though she was the lest of his concerns .     Soon the Transmetal 2 warrior exited the city, yet was quick to fall in line with the remainder of his comrades the simple site of them in such strict order giving him the impulse to do so. It was military behavior.**
